description: This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H and covers a requirement from the following product sub-categories of the SA:",
full_summary:
### Office Seating for RCMP

### Solicitation Information

* **Notice Reference #**: cb-299-63814361
* **Amendment #**: 3
* **Solicitation #**: 202300584
* **Publication Date**: June 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 25, 2024, at 2:00 PM
* **Solicitation Status**: Expiré (Expired)

### Procurement Information

* **UNSPSC Codes**: 56101700, 56112100
  + **Description**: Office furniture and seating
* **Procurement Category**: Général des gouvernements (General Governments)
* **Procurement Method**: Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Open Bidding)
* **Selection Criteria**: Prix le plus bas (Lowest Price)

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R2
* **Contact Person**: Alex Fraser
  + **Email**: Alexander.Fraser@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
  + **Phone**: (343) 596-8226

### Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating for the RCMP headquarters in Cornwall, Prince Edward Island. The RCMP has a requirement for the following office seating products:

1. Rotary chairs and rotary stools
2. Rotary guest chairs and side chairs

The tender is set aside for Indigenous business under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. The supply arrangement is not required for ineligible suppliers.

### Inquiries and Contact

Inquiries regarding this tender must be submitted to the contracting authority. For more information on how to become a pre-qualified supplier, please visit [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39850/204500584---furniture-plan-chairs_en.pdf).

### Attachments

Please see the following attachments for more information:

* [Notice of Proposal (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39850/202400584---npp-%28psib_en.pdf)
* [Amendment 0 (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39850/
